Text: This is actually twelve 3.5 hour mp3 files of the entire 42 hour archive.  This torrent suggests it is split in to many pieces, that is an error.

There are only 12 mp3 files, 1 gif, 1 nfo and 1 txt file!

D'uh!
Yeah, duh!  The original version of this archive had well over a thousand tiny mp3s.
Thanks, Fuller has awesome philosophical scope, way ahead of his time
